mn136:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn136:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā samiddhi araññakuṭikāyaṁ viharati.
mn136:2.2_0: Atha kho potaliputto paribbājako jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami;
mn136:2.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn136:2.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho potaliputto paribbājako āyasmantaṁ samiddhiṁ etadavoca:
mn136:2.4_0: “sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso samiddhi, samaṇassa gotamassa sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn136:2.6_0: Atthi ca sā samāpatti yaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpanno na kiñci vediyatī”ti?
mn136:2.9_0: ‘Atthi ca kho sā, āvuso, samāpatti yaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpanno na kiñci vediyatī’”ti.
mn136:2.12_0: “Ettha dāni mayaṁ there bhikkhū kiṁ vakkhāma,
mn136:2.12_1: yatra hi nāma evaṁnavo bhikkhu satthāraṁ parirakkhitabbaṁ maññissati.
mn136:2.13_0: Sañcetanikaṁ, āvuso samiddhi, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā kiṁ so vediyatī”ti?
mn136:2.14_0: “Sañcetanikaṁ, āvuso potaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā dukkhaṁ so vediyatī”ti.
mn136:2.15_0: Atha kho potaliputto paribbājako āyasmato samiddhissa bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandi nappaṭikkosi;
mn136:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi acirapakkante potaliputte paribbājake yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
mn136:3.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn136:3.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā samiddhi yāvatako ahosi potaliputtena paribbājakena saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ āyasmato ānandassa ārocesi.
mn136:3.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ samiddhiṁ etadavoca:
mn136:3.5_0: “atthi kho idaṁ, āvuso samiddhi, kathāpābhataṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn136:3.6_0: Āyāmāvuso samiddhi, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ bhagavato ārocessāma.
mn136:3.7_0: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
mn136:3.8_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
mn136:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca ānando āyasmā ca samiddhi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn136:4.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako ahosi āyasmato samiddhissa potaliputtena paribbājakena saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
mn136:5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
mn136:5.3_1: samiddhinā moghapurisena potaliputtassa paribbājakassa vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho ekaṁsena byākato”ti.
mn136:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

mn136:6.8_0: Ādiṁyeva, ānanda, potaliputtena paribbājakena tisso vedanā pucchitā.
mn136:6.9_0: Sacāyaṁ, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso potaliputtassa paribbājakassa evaṁ puṭṭho evaṁ byākareyya:
mn136:6.10_2: kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā sukhavedanīyaṁ sukhaṁ so vedayati;
mn136:6.11_2: kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā dukkhavedanīyaṁ dukkhaṁ so vedayati;
mn136:6.12_2: kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ so vedayatī’ti.
mn136:6.13_1: samiddhi moghapuriso potaliputtassa paribbājakassa sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.

mn136:6.15_0: Sace tumhe, ānanda, suṇeyyātha tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgaṁ vibhajantassā”ti.
mn136:7.2_0: yaṁ bhagavā mahākammavibhaṅgaṁ vibhajeyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
